ch.ethz.csb.youscope.client.addon.measurement
Interface MeasurementConfigurationAddon

All Known Implementing Classes:
MicroplateMeasurementConfigurationAddon
public interface MeasurementConfigurationAddon

Author:
langmo Interface for addons which implement custom jobs.

Method Summary
 void addConfigurationListener(MeasurementConfigurationAddonListener listener)
          Adds a listener to this configuration, which should e.g. be informed if the configuration finished.

Method Detail

createUI

void createUI(YouScopeFrame frame)
Should create the UI elements to configure the measurement in the given Frame. However, the frame should not be made visible.

Parameters:
frame - The frame in which the graphical elements to configure the measurements should be initialized.

setConfigurationData

void setConfigurationData(MeasurementConfigurationDTO measurementConfiguration)
                          throws ConfigurationException
Initializes the addon to the configuration data.

Parameters:
measurementConfiguration - The configuration data.
Throws:
ConfigurationException

getConfigurationData

MeasurementConfigurationDTO getConfigurationData()
Returns the configuration data.

Returns:
Configuration data of this measurement.

addConfigurationListener

void addConfigurationListener(MeasurementConfigurationAddonListener listener)
Adds a listener to this configuration, which should e.g. be informed if the configuration finished.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to add.

removeConfigurationListener

void removeConfigurationListener(MeasurementConfigurationAddonListener listener)
Removes a previously added listener.

Parameters:
listener - The listener to remove.
